attributes.action: DO NOT incur ANY costs for british taxpayers by offering to investigate theft of naked selfies of celebrities.
attributes.additional_details: We know Call me Dave will tell us that it will be good for the country and us for British taxpayers to bear the cost of investigating the theft of data from the I cloud, but we would rather he left it for some other hubristic politician in power, somewhere else, to play the good guy,FOR JUST ONCE DURING HIS SUPPOSED PREMIERSHIP!

rejection.details: This is not a Government matter.  The investigation is being handled by Apple.
